title: Detective Conan: Sermon of Suspense
premise: A peaceful Sunday sermon turns into a scene of attempted murder when a gunman targets a pastor. Detective Conan steps in to unravel the mystery behind the attack and prevent a future tragedy.

shotlist.description: The trailer opens with a serene view of a suburban church on a sunny morning.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A picturesque suburban church bathed in sunlight, with families walking towards the entrance, children playing, and birds flying.

voice_over.text: In a quiet town, a Sunday like any other...

shotlist.description: Inside the church, the pastor begins his sermon, smiling warmly at the congregation.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Interior of a church, light streaming through stained glass windows, focusing on a middle-aged pastor at the pulpit, smiling at his congregation.

voice_over.text: A sermon meant to bring peace and hope...

shotlist.description: Suspense builds as a mysterious figure enters the church, his expression unreadable.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A shadowy figure entering the back of the church, his face partially obscured, creating an air of mystery and tension.

voice_over.text: But not everyone came for the sermon...

shotlist.description: The camera focuses on the man's hand as he slowly reaches inside his coat.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Close-up of a man's hand reaching inside his coat, hinting at a concealed weapon, with the church's wooden pews in the background.

voice_over.text: A moment of suspense... a concealed intention.

shotlist.description: The congregation gasps as the man pulls out a gun and aims it at the pastor.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A horrified congregation as a man pulls a gun from his coat and aims it at the unsuspecting pastor at the pulpit.

voice_over.text: In a split second, peace shatters...

shotlist.description: The gun clicks but fails to fire, the pastor dives behind the lectern, chaos ensues.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: The pastor diving for cover behind the lectern as the gun clicks without firing, causing panic among the congregation.

voice_over.text: You can hear the gun click.

shotlist.description: A brave deacon tackles the gunman, struggling to restrain him.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A church deacon heroically tackling the gunman in the aisle, trying to wrestle the gun away, with other congregants rushing to help.

shotlist.description: Detective Conan arrives, analyzing the scene with his keen detective skills.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan stepping into the church, his expression serious and focused, observing the chaos and the restrained gunman.

shotlist.description: Intense investigation scenes follow, with Conan interrogating suspects and gathering clues.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan in deep conversation with various church members, showing intense expressions, with close-ups of hands exchanging items and notes being taken.

voice_over.text: Every clue, every whisper tells a story...

shotlist.description: The trailer cuts to a suspenseful chase sequence, with Conan pursuing a crucial lead.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan running through narrow city streets, dodging between pedestrians and vehicles, his face determined.

voice_over.text: A race against time to prevent another tragedy...

shotlist.description: The trailer climaxes with a tense standoff involving Conan and the true mastermind.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A dramatic standoff at night, Conan facing off against a silhouetted figure on a rooftop, city lights in the background.

shotlist.description: The final shot builds anticipation, with Conan declaring his deduction, backlit by the setting sun.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Conan standing confidently, backlit by a dramatic sunset, about to reveal the truth, with a shadowed crowd listening intently.

voice_over.text: The truth is always within reach...
